description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，曾任山西省副省长、山西省人大常委会副主任等职。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, who has served as Vice Governor of Shanxi Province and Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，是杜五安的国籍国。
description.en: A country in East Asia, it is the country of nationality for Du Wu'an.

description.zh-cn: 山西省人民政府的组成部门之一。
description.en: One of the constituent departments of the Shanxi Provincial People's Government.

nodes.id: 中国共产党临汾地区委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党临汾地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省临汾地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Linfen Prefecture of Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山西省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shanxi Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 山西省人民政府的组成部门之一。
description.en: One of the constituent departments of the Shanxi Provincial People's Government.

en: Standing Committee of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 山西省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替杜五安担任中共临汾地委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Du Wu'an as the Secretary of the CPC Linfen Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山西省定襄县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Dingxiang County, Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 第九届全国人民代表大会

zh-cn: 第九届全国人民代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关，任期为1998年至2003年。
description.en: The highest state authority of the People's Republic of China, with a term from 1998 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 杜五安早年曾担任定襄县委副书记、书记。
description.en: Du Wu'an served as Deputy Secretary and Secretary of the Dingxiang County Party Committee in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，杜五安任山西省粮食厅厅长。
description.en: In 1983, Du Wu'an was appointed Director of the Shanxi Provincial Grain Department.

relationships.target: 中国共产党临汾地区委员会

description.zh-cn: 杜五安担任中共临汾地区委员会首任书记。
description.en: Du Wu'an served as the first Secretary of the CPC Linfen Prefectural Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，杜五安进入省委，任山西省人民政府副秘书长。
description.en: In 1988, Du Wu'an joined the provincial committee and served as Deputy Secretary-General of the Shanxi Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1994年，杜五安任山西省交通厅厅长。
description.en: In 1994, Du Wu'an was appointed Director of the Shanxi Provincial Department of Transportation.
In 1995, Du Wu'an was appointed Vice Governor of Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 2003年1月，杜五安任山西省人大常委会副主任。
description.en: In January 2003, Du Wu'an was appointed Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Shanxi Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 杜五安卸任中国共产党临汾地区委员会书记职务后，由王民接任。
description.en: After Du Wu'an stepped down as Secretary of the CPC Linfen Prefectural Committee, he was succeeded by Wang Min.

relationships.target: 第九届全国人民代表大会
